definition: to take a broad view of sth
heddle (device to form warp in weaving textiles)/Taiwan pr. [zong4]
to sum up/to put together/Taiwan pr. [zong4]
to look at/to watch/to observe/to behold/to advise/concept/point of view/outlook

sentences.english: However, the present studies focus on the successes of Yong-Cheng.
sentences.chinese: 然而，綜觀目前研究，學者多聚焦於雍正帝的功業。

sentences.english: Hu simply lacked the credibility. Throughout history, the Chinese leadership has never allowed generals to take over state affairs.
sentences.chinese: 綜觀歷史，中國的領導層從不讓將軍接管國家大事。

sentences.english: Natsume Sousaki has created many images of the female sex in his works.
sentences.chinese: 綜觀夏目漱石一生的創作，他塑造了不少女性形象。

sentences.english: From Zhang Kangkang's works, we will ultimately repentant to the divinity of humity.
sentences.chinese: 綜觀張抗抗的文學創作，得知人終必向人的神性懺悔。

sentences.english: An analysis of the overall international and domestic situations shows that China is still in an important period of strategic opportunities.
sentences.chinese: 綜觀國際國內形勢，我國仍處於重要戰略機遇期。

definition: to increase steadily/to grow with each passing day
to try hard to/to strive to
to make a contribution/to establish/to found/contribution
